name: MTLBlendOperation
desc: For every pixel, MTLBlendOperation determines how to combine and weight the source fragment values with the destination values. Some blend operations multiply the source values by a source blend factor (SBF), multiply the destination values by a destination blend factor (DBF), and then combine the results using addition or subtraction. Other blend operations use either a minimum or maximum function to determine the result.

items.name: case add
items.desc: Add portions of both source and destination pixel values.

items.name: case subtract
items.desc: Subtract a portion of the destination pixel values from a portion of the source.

items.name: case reverseSubtract
items.desc: Subtract a portion of the source values from a portion of the destination pixel values.

items.name: case min
items.desc: Minimum of the source and destination pixel values.

items.name: case max
items.desc: Maximum of the source and destination pixel values.
